Content: Troops of the Security Forces Headquarters - Kilinochchi warmly welcomed the ‘Paada Yathra’ devotees when they arrived in Kilinochchi area during 4-5 August in order to attend the annual feast at Matha Church in Mulankavil on Sunday (4) before they set out to the Holy Shrine of Madu. On the directions of Major General Vijitha Ravipriya,  Commander, Security Forces - Kilinochchi, troops of 19 Sri Lanka Light Infantry (SLLI) and 11 (Volunteer) Gajaba Regiment extended their hospitality  by providing refreshments to the those devotees on 'Paada Yathra'. On 5 August, the devotees were offered drinking water by the troops in the 651 Brigade near the Paliaru Bridge while they were walking towards the Madhu Church.
